pullrequest.title: Additionally publish root /clock topic if no other simulation running

content.raw:
So I believe that if it is the case of multiple simulation runners starting in the same Server instance, this bit of code insures that they are starting sequentially: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/0c60411df5f6b4a0c9b6f7fb9ea3b91e7f068f5b/src/Server.cc#lines-245](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/0c60411df5f6b4a0c9b6f7fb9ea3b91e7f068f5b/src/Server.cc#lines-245)

If it is multiple Server executables, then there will be a race condition, I’m not sure how we would guarantee other than starting one, sleeping, then starting another.
